content: **vixen s vibe crochet cowl** flirty festive and fabulously fun vixen s vibe is the not-so-ugly holiday crochet cowl you ll be rocking all season long this stranded colorwork beauty is designed for adventurous beginners to intermediate crocheters and is worked in the rounds from bottom up using crochet techniques yep we re carrying that yarn like the spectrum stitch swoncho 1 this project is part of the **sleigh the holidays christmas in july make-along** and pairs perfectly with its knit counterpart dancer s delight because everyone deserves a little merry and bright in their yarn life featuring bold holiday motifs this piece is totally giftable and totally wearable from parties to pajama days pattern details technique stranded colorwork skill level adventurous beginner to intermediate construction worked in the round sizing one size fits most yarn sport weight in 5-10 colors includes ✅ written instructions ✅ full colorwork charts ✅ video tutorials ✅ stitch fiddle tracking link pattern upgrade only ✅ color blocks instructions pattern upgrade only ✅ ad-free pdf available with pattern upgrade ✨ the pattern is ***free*** on the marly bird blog or grab the pattern upgrade at the marly bird house 2 for a printable pdf unlimited access and interruption-free crafting are you ready to sleigh the season with vixen-level flair let s get stitchin 1 https //marlybird com/blog/spectrum-stitch-crochet-swoncho-pattern/ 2 https //marlybird thrivecart com/2025-vinxens-vibe-cowl-pattern-upgrade/
